verses.roman:
jagat-maṅgala tāṅra 'kṛṣṇa-caitanya'-nāma
nāma, rūpa, guṇa tāṅra, saba--anupama

synonyms: jagat-maṅgala—all-auspicious to the whole world; tāṅra—His; kṛṣṇa-caitanya—Śrī Kṛṣṇa Caitanya; nāma—name; nāma—name; rūpa—form; guṇa—the quality; tāṅra—His; saba—all; anupama—unparalleled.
translation: "His name, Kṛṣṇa Caitanya, is all-auspicious to the world. Everything about Him-His name, form, and qualities-is unparalleled.
